name: 机退怪兽
description: 指挥官，你将指挥人类最后的钢铁机甲来击退怪兽洪流！《机退怪兽》是一款以微操驱动的硬核塔防游戏。以手控操作的射击以及技能释放来适应防御阵型以及敌人配置的不断变化。
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
